title: Drawing, "Design for a Base"
medium: Pen and yellow ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left corner: X; upper right: SOCLE/MARBRE/BLANC PUR [underlined several times]; in pen and yellow ink, center right:  CERCLE/VERMEIL
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Rectangular base tapering toward bottom with rounded upper corners drawn in elevation.  To be executed in white marble with a central applied vermeil band indicated in pen and yellow ink.  Lines drawn to indicate object sitting in well.  Underdrawing in graphite of based in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Base".
Pen and yellow ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-4.
